## Dumping PS1 BIOS files

PlayStation 1 (PS1) emulators require official BIOS files. These can legally be dumped from personally-owned hardware or extracted from the PlayStation 3 (PS3) firmware. The PS1 BIOS can be dumped from a PS1 or the PlayStation Classic (PSC).
